document_data.name: Yarin
document_data.mainbody:
'''Yarin''' was a retired pickpocket from the the capital of [[Amn]], [[Athkatla]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''I hears that there's a woman behind it all, but nobody knows 'er name. She's been collectin' all the thieves she can, recruit in' amidst the ranks of the thieves not welcome in the guild.''|Yarin}}
document_data.Possessions: Yarin owned ''[[gloves of pickpocketing]]''. Among other items, he had a ''[[potion of extra healing]]'' stashed away, as well as a [[scroll]] of ''[[melf's acid arrow]]'', next to a ''[[History of Shadowdale]]'' tome.
document_data.History: At some point before the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, Yarin retired from the life of thievery and spent his time in the illicit backrooms of the [[Copper Coronet]] in the slums of Athkatla's [[Athkatla/River District|River District]]. He was aware of the recently raging guild war in the city, but he was not a member of the [[Shadow Thieves]]. At some point, he was approached by a member of the new guild, secretly a [[vampire]] coven, trying to recruit Yarin. The new mysterious guild was not picky in who they recruited; younglings and old men like Yarin were among them, and the offer was quite lucrative. However, Yarin had little interest in returning to the rogue's life.
